name: Beyond Two Worlds
description:
Idealtheif and Old Samir would like for you to please playtest our first collaborative venture into gaming!

Completing levels requires collecting all coins to open the door to the next level.

You can move around using the left and right arrow keys, and jump by pressing the spacebar.

We're working on building a platformer for a game jam (creating a game in short amount of time), and would love to listen to your feedback on the game. Any comments, criticisms, are welcome - you can reach out to us at idealandsamir@gmail.com.

Source Files: https://github.com/Old-Samir/GameJam2022v2
